snippet: The K900 exemplifies Kia’s ongoing move toward larger models. But unlike the German automakers it seeks to emulate, the K900 four-door sedan puts passenger comfort ahead of driver engagement.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2015 Kia K900.
lead_paragraph: The K900 exemplifies Kia’s ongoing move toward larger models. But unlike the German automakers it seeks to emulate, the K900 four-door sedan puts passenger comfort ahead of driver engagement.
